<!-- React Native Expo TypeScript project for "bird" chat app -->
This project is a modern dark-mode chat application built with Expo, React Native, TypeScript, and Material Design 3 principles.

## Key Features
- Dark-mode Material Design 3 UI
- Atomic component system with design tokens
- Smooth animations using Moti and Reanimated
- Complete navigation structure
- Phone authentication flow
- Chat interface with typing indicators

## Tech Stack
- Expo + React Native + TypeScript
- React Native Paper (Material 3)
- React Navigation 6
- Moti + React Native Reanimated
- Material Symbols icons

## Development Commands
- `npm start` - Start Expo development server
- `npm run web` - Run in browser
- `npm run ios` - Run on iOS simulator
- `npm run android` - Run on Android emulator

The project includes a complete design system with tokens, atomic components (DynamicHeader, AnimatedFloatingLabel, BirdCard, Avatar), and a full navigation flow from splash screen to main chat interface.
